Package weka.core.pmml

Class PMMLFactory

java.lang.Object
weka.core.pmml.PMMLFactory
public class PMMLFactory extends Object
This class is a factory class for reading/writing PMML models
Version:
$Revision: 10203 $
Author:
Mark Hall (mhall{[at]}pentaho{[dot]}com)
